duties_responsibilities.duty: Investigate and manage large and complex property and liability claims for Insurance Trust members and TPA clients.
Field inspections for large and significant liability losses and effective litigation management.
Independently negotiate settlements with members, claimants or their legal representatives.
Identify subrogation opportunities and work with defense counsel to obtain recoveries.
Attend mediations, trials, depositions, workshops, seminars, and training for members.
Conduct investigations by contacting members/claimants/city attorney, analyzing lawsuits, determining potential coverage exclusions, and identifying potential fraud.
Responsible for identifying claim exposures requiring reinsurance reporting, preparing reinsurance status reports, maintaining proper reserves, and obtaining properly executed settlement documents.
Professional development through continuing education courses and seminars, participating in industry-related courses, and attaining insurance/claims designations.
Research and review of publications, media reports, and judicial opinions.

education_certification.credential: Over five years of practical multi-Line claims experience.
Valid Class C Driver's License and North Carolina Adjuster License must be maintained.
